MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

German.Keywords: HTML editor, web page maker, web design creator, anti aliasing effects, mouse over buttons, WYSIWYG, site management, publishing, web designer, round corners, free, freeware, favorite, templates, CSS, FTP, drag and drop, Webseitenerstellung
German.Char_Desc_80: Drag&Drop HTML Editor zum Erstellen von Webseiten mit integrierten DHTML-Menüs
German.Char_Desc_250: DFM2HTML ist ein Drag&Drop HTML-Editor mit integriertem DHTML-Menü-Designer. Effekte wie Anti-Aliasing / Schatten / Runde Ecken können beliebig kombiniert werden.
German.Char_Desc_450: DFM2HTML ist ein Drag&Drop HTML-Editor mit integriertem DHTML-Menü-Designer. Effekte wie Anti-Aliasing / Schatten / Runde Ecken können beliebig kombiniert werden. Mit dem integrierten FTP-Upload-Manager können Webseiten auf Knopfdruck auf einen Server geladen werden. DFM2HTML stellt viele fertige Webseiten-Schablonen und Mouse-Over-Buttons bereit.
German.Char_Desc_2000: DFM2HTML ist ein Drag&Drop HTML-Editor mit integriertem DHTML-Menü-Designer. Effekte wie Anti-Aliasing / Schatten / Runde Ecken können beliebig kombiniert werden. Mit dem integrierten FTP-Upload-Manager können Webseiten auf Knopfdruck auf einen Server geladen werden. DFM2HTML stellt viele fertige Webseiten-Schablonen und Mouse-Over-Buttons bereit. HTML-Formulare und HTML-Frames können WYSIWYG-mäßig erstellt werden. Der Stylesheet-Mechanismus unterstützt ein systematisches Design von Webseiten. Mit dem neuen Unicode-Feature können Webseiten in jeder Sprache erstellt werden.

English.Keywords: HTML editor, web page maker, web design creator, anti aliasing effects, mouse over buttons, WYSIWYG, site management, publishing, web designer, round corners, free, freeware, favorite, templates, CSS, FTP, drag and drop, Webseitenerstellung
English.Char_Desc_80: WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) web editor with integrated DHTML menus.
English.Char_Desc_250: DFM2HTML is a Drag&Drop HTML-Editor with an integrated DHTML menu designer. Effekts like anti-aliasing / shadow / rounded corners can be freely combined.
English.Char_Desc_450: DFM2HTML is a Drag&Drop HTML-Editor with an integrated DHTML menu designer. Effekts like anti-aliasing / shadow / rounded corners can be freely combined. DFM2HTML comes with many templates and a wide range of mouse-over buttons. HTML forms and HTML frames are best supported.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
DFM2HTML is a Drag&Drop HTML-Editor with an integrated DHTML menu designer. Effekts like anti-aliasing / shadow / rounded corners can be freely combined. DFM2HTML comes with many templates and a wide range of mouse-over buttons. HTML forms and HTML frames are best supported.
You can publish your site with the build-in FTP Upload manager in an instant. The stylesheet mechanism allows a systematic page design. One DFM2HTML document will result in carefully generated HTML files and images.

L I C E N S E A G R E E M E N T
You should carefully read the following terms and conditions before using this software. Your use of this software indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty stipulation.
DFM2HTML is freeware, so no registration is required.
All web pages generated with DFM2HTML can of course be used for commercial purposes. However it is not allowed to sell DFM2HTML itself.
Disclaimer of Warranty
THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. Because of the various hardware and software environments into which DFM2HTML may be put, NO WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE IS OFFERED.
Good data processing procedure dictates that any program be thoroughly tested with non-critical data before relying on it. The user must assume the entire risk of using the program. ANY LIABILITY OF THE SELLER WILL BE LIMITED EXCLUSIVELY TO PRODUCT REPLACEMENT OR REFUND OF PURCHASE PRICE.
Distribution
You are hereby licensed to make as many copies of this software and documentation as you wish; give exact copies of the original version to anyone; and distribute the software and documentation in its unmodified form via electronic means. There is no charge for any of the above.
You are specifically prohibited from charging, or requesting donations, for any such copies, however made; and from distributing the software and/or documentation with other products (commercial or otherwise) without prior written permission.
